amendment.description: Amendment offered as a manager's amendment to make technical and sundry changes to the bill. Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1113, the amendment was considered as modified by striking the matter proposed to be inserted as section 506.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-419 offered as a managers amendment to make technical and sundry changes.

action.text: Reyes amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Reyes amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 166 (Roll no. 69).
